title: For it’s time, what was the worst iPhone? - Quora

response.answer_text: I could say iPhones not made by Apple, since they are all copies of the original. However, some are well built and good quality. But most run Android which was a hurried-to-market product in order to capture some of Apple’s market. Windows did the same, not tailoring Windows to the small portable form factor, but then selling it as ‘you get the full OS’. That is both Android and Windows took somewhat the lazy approach to get products to market quickly.
No bad iPhones, but if I had to pick, I’d pick the 5C. It was built less expensive.
